Francisco Carvalho

Home

Oh hey, I’ve been expecting you. Welcome to my little node of the web. Since you’re here, you should probably know a few things.

BIO

xiq is short for Francisco, my name

I’m based in Lisbon, Portugal

I like to say I love everything, especially complex systems

Currently a master’s student in Computer Science, with a focus on AI

Thinking about AI Governance, Safety, and Policy

I also make some music and philosophy here

WORK

My interests range widely, and I do a lot of seemingly disconnected stuff. I’m using the website to make sense of the fractal-like side-quests. I document most of them at the sidequests page.

If you’re the curious type, feel free to browse The Vault. It’s where I keep all my treasures: books, writings, and other links that have influenced my thinking or that I otherwise find important.
